info.author: Bartosz Telenczuk and Dmytro Bielievtsov
info.description:
SpikeSort is a flexible spike sorting framework 
      implemented entirely  in Python based on widely-used packages such as numpy,
      PyTables and matplotlib. It features manual and automatic clustering, many 
      data formats and it is memory-efficient.
info.name: SpikeSort
info.html_description:
SpikeSort is a flexible spike sorting framework
implemented entirely in Python based on widely-used packages such as numpy, PyTables and matplotlib. It features manual and automatic clustering, many data formats and it is memory-efficient.
